PHRASE.LANG: Purchase ModPoints for the EmoRay Store. This particular consumable will give you 2500 ModPoints.\n\n When you enter the EmoRay Store your ModPoints will be deducted from this consumable before using ModPoints already earned through gameplay.[#Legal]

Achat ModPoints pour le magasin de EmoRay. Cet article consommable particulier vous donnera ModPoints 2500. \n \n
Lorsque vous entrez dans le magasin EmoRay vos ModPoints seront déduits de ce consommable avant d'utiliser ModPoints déjà gagné en jouant.[#Legal]

Kauf ModPoints für die EmoRay Store. Diese besondere Verbrauchsmaterialien erhalten Sie 2500 ModPoints. \n \n
Wenn Sie die EmoRay Shop geben Sie bitte Ihre ModPoints von dieser Verbrauchsmaterialien, bevor Sie ModPoints schon verdient durch Spielen abgezogen werden.[#Legal]

Acquista ModPoints per l'archivio EmoRay. Questo consumo particolare vi darà 2500 ModPoints. \n\n
Quando si entra nel negozio EmoRay tuoi ModPoints sarà dedotto da questo materiale di consumo prima di utilizzare ModPoints già guadagnati attraverso il gioco.[#Legal]

Compra ModPoints para el almacén de EmoRay. Este consumible en particular le dará ModPoints 2500. \n\n
Al entrar en la tienda EmoRay sus ModPoints se deducirá de este consumible antes de usar ModPoints ya obtenidos a través del juego.[#Legal]

Purchase ModPoints for the EmoRay Store. This particular consumable will give you 2500 ModPoints.\n\n When you enter the EmoRay Store your ModPoints will be deducted from this consumable before using ModPoints already earned through gameplay.[#Legal]
